channel.title: Comments on: Glen asks, “How do I set up a home Wi-Fi network?”

item.description: […] at home or work. If you don’t have a home wireless network, you may want to consider setting one up. This will cost some money, but it will almost definitely be cheaper than paying overage charges to […]
